Title: Strange Attractors
Plot: Matt goes to extreme measures to extinguish Sylar , who continues to torment him. Elsewhere, HRG calls in a favor from Tracy to save a troubled young boy whose misfortunes resemble her own. While Claire and Gretchen are being hazed by their new sorority sisters, they realize pledging might not be their biggest problem.
GuestStars: Madeline Zima, Dawn Olivieri, Raphael Sbarge, Mark L. Young, Lisa Lackey, Rick Worthy, Tessa Thompson, Bonnie Brantley, Kate Purgal, Danica Stewart, Candice Patton, Randy Flagler, Jonathan Goldstein, Darryl Critt
